setup.small: Place Skidmark in play, "Superpowered Drug Dealer" side up. Search the villain deck for all Thug cards; put them aside as the 'Thug deck'.

gameplay.small:
If the Thug deck is empty at the start of the villain turn, the heroes lose the game.
At the end of the villain turn, play H - 1 Thugs from the top of the Thug deck.
When this target is destroyed, flip it instead

back.title: Defeated Drug Dealer
back.gameplay:
If the Thug deck is empty at the start of the villain turn, the heroes lose the game.
At the end of the villain turn, play 1 Thug from the top of the Thug deck.
If there are no villain targets in play, the heroes win the game

card.name: Festival of Blood
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1

card.name: Festival of Excess
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1

card.name: Festival of Love
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Thug deck

card.name: Not Exactly Sanitary
card.text: Whenever a villain target deals non-toxic damage to another target, the villain target deals 1 toxic damage to that target

card.name: Squealer
card.text: Ignore villain targets when determining targeting for damage from environmental cards. At the start of the villain turn, play the top card in the environment deck

card.name: Mush
card.text: This card is immune to melee and projectile damage. At the end of the villain turn, Mush deals 1 melee damage to all hero targets

card.name: Scrub
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, Scrub deals 5 energy damage to all targets (except himself) with a HP evenly divisible by 3

card.name: Helicopter
card.text: Skidmark is immune to melee damage. At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the Thug deck

card.name: Reveller
card.text:
When this card would be placed in the villain trash or the villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 1 melee damage to the hero target with the highest HP

card.name: Tough
card.text:
When this card would be placed in the villain trash or the villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 melee damage to the 2 hero targets with the highest HP

card.name: Sadist
card.text:
When this card would be placed in the villain trash or the villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP
